scripts.copy-assets-win: if exist dist\assets rmdir /S /Q dist\assets && xcopy /E /I /Y assets dist\assets
scripts.copy-assets: node -e "require('fs').existsSync('dist/assets') && require('fs').rmSync('dist/assets', { recursive: true, force: true }); require('fs').mkdirSync('dist/assets', { recursive: true }); require('fs').cpSync('assets', 'dist/assets', { recursive: true })"
